alert.note: Alert for Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 3:49AM MDT until April 28 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches for the higher elevations of the Bighorns and associated passes. Winds will be out of the north with gusts over 50 mph likely. * WHERE...Bighorn Mountains West and Bighorn Mountains Southeast. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to 1 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over the Bighorns, including over Granite Pass and Powder River Pass. Gusty winds will result in low visibility at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Most of the snow will fall across the northern portions of the Bighorns, especially on the eastern slopes. The heaviest snow will fall Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
